definition: as many as/no less than/not inferior to/as good as/on a par with
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.chinese: 我可是亲吻过不下于20个女孩的。

sentences.english: The products of this small neighbourhood factory are as good as those turned out by some large state-run plants.
sentences.chinese: 这个街道小厂的产品质量不下于一些国营大厂。

sentences.english: There are as many as 300 new products on show.
sentences.chinese: 展出的新产品不下于300种。

sentences.english: There were no less than two thousand people at the match.
sentences.chinese: 这场比赛不下于两千人到场观看。
到会的人不下于一千人。

sentences.english: John could horse-back ride with the best of them, but he never boasted about it.
sentences.chinese: 约翰的马术不下于任何人，但他从不夸口。

definition: to make reference to/to write about
lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
to compare/to draw a parallel/to match/analogy/metaphor/comparison
accurate to perfection (idiom)/precise to the finest detail
out of the ordinary/out of the common run
variant of 巔峰|巅峰[dian1 feng1]
